# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.studioBackgroundStem

**Case**

Isolates the ambience when foreground is studio Audio Mix and place it in a spatial stem. There is no voice stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case studioBackgroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.studioBackgroundStem
